lines.text: I haven't been close to a woman for a long time.
Let's keep it that way, shall we? You stay out of my world and I'll stay out of yours.
Very private, Mr. Gunn. Very exclusive.
Give me a cigarette, will you, Gunn?
Any time you say. You make it sound exciting.
I'd give a lot just for a shower and some clean clothes. And a double martini!
Knight, I'm a God-fearing man. Something happened here... to him. I don't want to think why.
Are you trying to tell me that he's under the spell of some ouanga? A hex?
All right. Go there. Find out. I'd welcome it.
When I take hold of something, I don't let go.

[Stopping Martin Schuyler from firing his gun]
"No you fool, they'll slaughter us to bits!"
